DOC.brief_summary: Study determine men around world prefer sildenafil tadalafil .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Preference Tadalafil Sildenafil Men With Problems Getting Erection Across Nations
DOC.criteria: Must legal age accord country . Must history erectile dysfunction least 3 month . Must currently use sildenafil last six week . Agree use ED treatment study . Anticipate female sexual partner study . History primary sexual disorder Treatment nitrate Have penile implant clinically significant penile deformity History certain heart problem Do meet certain lab value reference range
